mapper.select: SELECT ri.reserve_date as rdate, ci.cafe_address as caddress, ci.cafe_name as cname, ci.title_photo as img, reserve_id, isCancelled FROM reserve_info ri inner join cafe_info ci on ri.cafe_id = ci.cafe_id WHERE member_id = #{id} and ci.cafe_name like "%${_parameter}%" ORDER BY reserve_date asc;
